models.name: IdentityProof
models.description: Represents a proof from an external identity provider.

fields.name: provider
fields.description: The name of the identity provider.

fields.name: provider_username
fields.description: The account owner's username on the identity provider's service.

fields.name: profile_url
fields.description: The account owner's profile URL on the identity provider.

fields.name: proof_url
fields.description: A link to a statement of identity proof, hosted by the identity provider.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: The name of the identity provider.
